about: A CKAN schema for the Belgian NAP

dataset_fields.label: Metadata language
dataset_fields.help_text: Describes the language(s) in which the metadata is described

dataset_fields.label: Name of dataset
dataset_fields.help_text: Describes the dataset in a generic term or gives a short description. The author is encouraged to write a meaningful description

dataset_fields.label: Description of dataset
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. “Contains static high priority network of Belgium: Road Name, Lane number, Direction”
dataset_fields.help_text: Gives the user more information about content of the dataset or service. The used language for the description should be the language from the field metadata language

dataset_fields.label: Resource type
dataset_fields.help_text: 'Travel information service' means an ITS service, including digital maps, that provides users, and end-users, with travel and traffic information of at least one transport mode

dataset_fields.label: Start date of publication
dataset_fields.help_text: Describes from which date and time on the data delivery is applicable. If left empty, the publication is considered as available immediately

dataset_fields.label: End date of publication
dataset_fields.help_text: Describes the date when data delivery to this publication terminates. If left empty, the publication does not expire

dataset_fields.label: Transportation modes covered
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: [TO BE ADAPTED] this field is will have to contain a predefined list of items
dataset_fields.help_text: Describes the transportation mode covered by the data set. Please select at least one item

dataset_fields.label: Contract or licence
dataset_fields.help_text: Describes the conditions of use of the data set

dataset_fields.label: Condition for use
dataset_fields.help_text: If applicable, please provide an URL (eg. to a PDF document) which contains all important information, or describe the conditions explicitly

dataset_fields.label: Version notes
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. Some useful notes about the version

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data
